reporting-org.narrative: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan(INBAR)

title.narrative: Mechanisms for ensuring project goal and associated milestones

description.narrative: 14 participatory stewards were deployed in the different clusters to reach the community. 2 capacity building training were organized for the participatory stewards to enhance their capacity and build knowledge on bamboo policy and diversified products to establish enterprises. One program steering committee was formed, two virtual meetings were organized and the 3rd steering committee will be held in January in Uganda on hybrid mode, physical participation for African members, and virtual participation for the members from the Netherlands and China.

participating-org.narrative: Ethiopia Environment Forest Climate Change Commission
